ConfigEntry.ConfigEntryObject: <Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>AttestationOpenCasesByPolicy</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{1} has {0} pending attestation cases",ColorValue,ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>true</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>AttestationOpenCasesByPolicyMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>AttestationOpenCasesByPolicyYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#Number of pending attestation cases for {1} {2} by {0}", abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"),)</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Pending attestation cases")</ColorValueTerm></Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>AttestationOpenCasesByNextApprover</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{1} has {0} pending attestation cases to approve",ColorValue,ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>true</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>AttestationOpenCasesByNextApproverMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>AttestationOpenCasesByNextApproverYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#Number of attestation cases to approve by {1} {2} by {0}", abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"),)</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Pending attestation cases")</ColorValueTerm></Object>

<Object Type="DialogDashboardDef"><DisplayName>AttestationOpenCasesByFramework</DisplayName><Text>ObjectDisplay</Text><Tooltip>translate("#LDS#{2} has {0} rule violations and {1} pending attestation cases", SizeValue ,ColorValue,ObjectDisplayLong)</Tooltip><FilterByObject>False</FilterByObject><isHeatmap>true</isHeatmap><EqualSized>false</EqualSized><IconLayout>false</IconLayout><DashboardDefMonthly>AttestationOpenCasesByFrameworkMonthly</DashboardDefMonthly><DashboardDefYearly>AttestationOpenCasesByFrameworkYearly</DashboardDefYearly><RedLimit>max</RedLimit><GreenLimit>0</GreenLimit><RedLimitHistoric>max</RedLimitHistoric><GreenLimitHistoric>min</GreenLimitHistoric><YellowLimitHistoric>0</YellowLimitHistoric><TextHistoric>ObjectDisplay</TextHistoric><TooltipHistoric>translate("#LDS#Number of pending attestation cases in {1} {2} by {0}", abs(ColorValue) ,ObjectDisplayLong, if ( ColorValue>0) then translate("#LDS#increased") else translate("#LDS#decreased"),)</TooltipHistoric><ColorValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Open attestation cases")</ColorValueTerm><SizeValueTerm>translate("#LDS#Attestation policies in this framework")</SizeValueTerm></Object>

ConfigEntry.Value:
sqland(sqlcompareuid("uid_person", variable("%useruid%")),
"uid_person in (select uid_person from personinaerole where uid_aerole in ('CAP-AEROLE-IAG-CISO', 'CAP-AEROLE-AUDITING-AUDITOR') union all select piae.UID_Person from PersonInAERole piae join AERoleCollection aec on aec.UID_ParentAERole = piae.UID_AERole join ComplianceArea ca on ca.UID_OrgResponsible = piae.UID_AERole)")

ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#List of attestation charts and heatmaps on the governance start page")
translate("#LDS#Visibility of Access Governance - Attestation overview")
